Share price performance
The price of Zealand’s shares decreased by 34.2% during 2021 with a market closing share price at year-end of DKK 145.1, compared to DKK 220.6 at year-end 2020.
Annual General Meeting
The annual general meeting is scheduled to be held elec-tronically on Wednesday, April 6, 2022 at 3:00 PM CET. Additional information will become available at https://www.zealandpharma.com/annual-general-meeting no later than 3 weeks before the annual general meeting.
